articles.title: How will astronauts cruise around the Moon? NASA narrows choice to three options - Ars Technica
articles.description: "I know we’re asking a lot of these companies."
articles.content:
Enlarge/ NASA's generic concept for a lunar terrain vehicle.
79
NASA has made another bold bet on the nation's commercial space industry, this time asking private companies to provide a lunar rover… [+3388 chars]
